title: Email Notification When Conga Trigger Fails To Generate Document
author: Maybeleen Matammu
content: The customer requested to be notified when the Trigger fails to generate a document, to avoid the need for constant checking of the Trigger Dashboard for failed records.

comments.content: Thank you for your idea. I have moved to future consideration

title: Create a Function/Button in Conga Trigger Dashboard to enable setting up an automated email about the results when Conga Trigger is executed
author: Hanah Bengson
content:
Our clients are seeking to implement a feature that allows them to receive automated email notifications in the event of every Trigger execution.
 
Benefits:
1. Clients will receive timely notifications when a Trigger is executed, ensuring swift awareness of any issues with the results.
2. This functionality will enhance productivity for our clients, as they will no longer need to visit the dashboard to check for errors manually.
3. This feature is poised to significantly enhance the overall user experience, providing clients greater control and proactive error management.

comments.content: Thank you for your idea, I have moved to future consideration

title: Capability to see the records that run on a specific date
author: Dhanie Bermas
content: Customer is looking for the option to see the records that ran or failed on a specific date and export all data, not only those that has errors. Particularly records that were stuck in queued state.

comments.content: Thank you for your idea, I have moved to "future consideration".

title: Adding business unites to Conga trigger
author: Andy Quach
content:
we could add users to business units (one user - to many business units) and use the Business Unit to define who can see the transaction/associated records and final documents, as well where those documents are stored (kind of like the SC0). It would make it much easier/simpler for end users and admins to have control over security.
 
 This would also help with similar security concerns for Trigger - if the solution formula includes the Business Unit, and that set permissions for record/file access, it would be so much easier than the automations needed to configure access/ownership based on record details.

comments.content: Thank you for your idea, we will not be moving forward with it at this time. I've move it to "deferred"

title: Trigger error reports to pull reports in real time.

title: Conga Trigger - dynamic 'Used to send as' field
author: Alejandra Tarrell
